category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Can use links in posts without restrictions
Group members can use links within posts without any restrictions.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enables the link restriction. This function disables posts by users with too few posts if they contain external links. This allows a moderator pre-check.
If the user has more post than this value, the link restriction will become inactive.
The max number of links in a post before the link restriction activates.
A comma-separated list of domains to be considered internal when checking.
The link restriction is disabled in the selected boards. This is particularly useful for presentational boards.
